title: League won't launch??
body:
i have no idea whats going on but whenever i click launch nothing happens after my league just doesnt open. i tried reinstalling deleting  a few files like lol updater or something that a youtube video told me to do. still didnt work like i said i reinstalled didnt work. i tried repairing for corrupt data and it still doesnt work any help would be appreciated


PC specs

Msi gtx 970

i7 4700 hq 3.4 ghz 

350 gb ssd storage+905 ggb (on another drive)

16 ggb ddr (or ram)

windows 8.1 build 9600


THANK YOUU

replies.body: same issue, windows 7, similar specs. tried everything. bit of a coincidence several people are having the same issue. Did everything, repair, reinstall, launch it from folder, nothing. (i run league on admin as default) 100% a client issue as it only started after 6.20 and was an issue in 4.21 too. get it fixed riot.
ok right click on the icon for league go to run as admin

> [{quoted}](name=MrFawknSunshine ,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=idUlchGa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-10T01:33:38.515+0000)
>
> ok right click on the icon for league go to run as admin
 Still didnt work
maybe its not the league... maybe its your pc? maybe you need to fix your pc do a system restore or completely wipe the PC and start over

> [{quoted}](name=MrFawknSunshine ,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=idUlchGa,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-10T02:54:26.864+0000)
>
> maybe its not the league... maybe its your pc? maybe you need to fix your pc do a system restore or completely wipe the PC and start over

Yeah i agree im gonna try that right now and post later if it worked, dont really have anything important on my pc except games so yeah good suggestion

get a back up pc/lap top for all that shhh stuff u wanna look at... and not use ur main pc for that 

just a suggestion 

http://imgur.com/oZqut7q
Thanks for the help boys but i forgot to mention i had already tried

Run as admin, and dont delete parts of the game and expect it to work.

Also windows 8.1 is a flaming shit pile for gaming, please consider another OS.
